name: Way of Shadow
description: Monks of shadow specialize in stealth, trickery, and dark magic.

3.name: Shadow Arts
3.description: Spend 2 ki points to cast darkness, darkvision, pass without trace, or silence, and you learn the minor illusion cantrip.

6.name: Shadow Step
6.description: While in dim light or darkness, teleport up to 60 feet to another such space as a bonus action, gaining advantage on your next melee attack.

11.name: Cloak of Shadows
11.description: In an area of dim light or darkness, use your action to become invisible until you attack, cast a spell, or enter bright light.

17.name: Opportunist
17.description: When a creature within 5 feet of you is hit by an attack made by another creature, use your reaction to make a melee attack against it.

choices.name: Way of Shadow Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Way of Shadow subclass
